info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:44PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southwestern Washington and north central Rensselaer Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 344 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Round Lake, or near Clifton Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Ballston Spa, Cambridge, Greenwich, Round Lake, Country Knolls, North Ballston Spa, Gates, Malta, Lee, Easton, Stillwater, Schuylerville, Victory, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Deans Corners, Center White Creek and Center Falls. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 10 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized poor drainage flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
